name: Jan
title: jan.ai
payoff: Run AI offline with open source
shortDescription: Jan is an open-source, offline-capable alternative to ChatGPT, designed for users concerned about privacy and data security. It allows running powerful AI models like Llama3, Gemma, or Mistral directly on your device. Users can also connect to cloud-based models for enhanced capabilities. Ideal for developers and tech enthusiasts, Jan provides a customizable AI experience with the ability to create personalized assistants and integrate various extensions.
pros: Supports both local and cloud AI models
cons: Still under development with potential bugs
Requires technical knowledge to setup and use
Limited support and community due to being new
